Interface DatabaseProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
MySQLRequester
public interface DatabaseProvider

Kewilleen Gomes

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Get current connection
      Returns:
      MySQL or SQL connection

    • result

      <T> T result​(@NonNull @NonNull java.lang.String query, DatabaseFunction<java.sql.ResultSet,​T> databaseFunction, java.lang.Object... objects)
      Return result from connection query
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of return object
      Parameters:
      query - line structure to execute in sql
      databaseFunction - executes an functional function from java 8
      objects - array to sync with result set
      Returns:
      result from searched

    • close

      void close()
      Close connection bridge

    • executeUpdate

      int executeUpdate​(@NonNull @NonNull java.lang.String query, java.lang.Object... objects)
      Execute updates queries with return update state
      Parameters:
      query - mysql query
      objects - objects to sync with statement
      Returns:
      state (0 for nothing, 1 for any, -1 for error)

    • connect

      DatabaseProvider connect()
      Use to bridge connection between your plugin and mysql server
      Returns:
      actually instance from provider

    • hasConnection

      boolean hasConnection()
      Verify if jdbc has connection bridge You need to use connect method at least once;
      Returns:
      if has any connection

    • execute

      void execute​(@NonNull @NonNull java.lang.String query, java.lang.Object... objects)
      Parameters:
      query - execute query, update or some think like that
      objects - array to sync with result set

    • setStatementObjects

      default java.sql.PreparedStatement setStatementObjects​(java.sql.PreparedStatement statement, java.lang.Object[] objects) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Sync objects with statement
      Parameters:
      statement - instance of statement
      objects - array of objects to sync within
      Returns:
      instance of statement
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - setObject can throws errors
